description.en:
event fired after a tooltip is hidden
   use args.owner to get a reference to the widget
   use args.tooltip to get the string displayed in the tooltip
   use args.value to get the value of the cell the tooltip was displayed for
   use args.element to get a reference to the cell the tooltip was displayed for
   use args.index to get the row index of the cell the tooltip was displayed for
   use args.columnKey to get the column key of the cell the tooltip was displayed for
   use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the cell the tooltip was displayed for

description.en: a list of custom column settings that specify custom tooltip settings for a specific column (whether tooltips are enabled / disabled)
description.jp: a list of custom column settings that specify custom tooltip settings for a specific column (whether tooltips are enabled / disabled)

description.en: Specifies the column key of the column with tooltip
description.jp: Specifies the column key of the column with tooltip

description.en: Specifies the column index of the column with tooltip
description.jp: Specifies the column index of the column with tooltip

description.en: Enables / disables tooltips on the specified column. By default tooltips are displayed for each column. Note: This option is mandatory.
description.jp: Enables / disables tooltips on the specified column. By default tooltips are displayed for each column. Note: This option is mandatory.

description.en: sets the left position of the tooltip relative to the mouse cursor
description.jp: sets the left position of the tooltip relative to the mouse cursor

description.en: sets the top position of the tooltip relative to the mouse cursor
description.jp: sets the top position of the tooltip relative to the mouse cursor

description.en: sets the time tooltip fades in and out when showing/hiding
description.jp: sets the time tooltip fades in and out when showing/hiding

description.en:
Type="integer" The time in milliseconds after which tooltip hides when mouse
   cursor gets outside of the cell.
description.jp:
Type="integer" The time in milliseconds after which tooltip hides when mouse
   cursor gets outside of the cell.

description.en:
The time in milliseconds after which tooltip will show when
   mouse cursor is hovered over a cell.
description.jp:
The time in milliseconds after which tooltip will show when
   mouse cursor is hovered over a cell.

description.en: Controls the tooltip's style
description.jp: Controls the tooltip's style

description.en: The tooltip will be positioned according to the mouse cursor
description.jp: The tooltip will be positioned according to the mouse cursor

description.en: The tooltip will be positioned according to the target element
description.jp: The tooltip will be positioned according to the target element

description.en: Determines the tooltip visibility option
description.jp: Determines the tooltip visibility option

description.en: Tooltips always show for hovered elements
description.jp: Tooltips always show for hovered elements

description.en: TooltipsDo not show automatically
description.jp: TooltipsDo not show automatically

description.en: Tooltips show only when the underlying data overflows its container
